Package com.jpmc.theater

Class Theater

java.lang.Object
com.jpmc.theater.Theater
public class Theater extends Object
This class represents the Theater object. It has the schedule of movie showings and a list of reservations made. It also allows the user to manage movie showings and reservations, as well as display the movie schedule to console.
Author:
Ray Wang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Theater()
    Constructs the theater object and initializes the provider, schedule, and reservation.
